name: Electric Tortoise
description:
Blade Runner and I, Robot-inspired interrogation game. Use Left-mouse button to move/select dialogue options.

A game by Dillon Rogers.

Music by Joe Baxter-Webb.

Like my games? Follow me at @Jollyrogers99 or contact me here.
